detaileddescription.para: Member variables from the configuration file

briefdescription.para: Output streams to write publications.
Daily return. The profit for the day divided by the capital committed.
Cumulative PNL from the beginning of the simulation to the current date.
The profit or loss in dollars for the day.
Daily long position counter variable.
Daily short position counter variable.
Daily total position counter variable.
Total amount of capital committed to the model at the end of the day.
Long capital minus the short capital at the end of the day.
Date today.
Daily PNL record.
Daily cumulative ROR record for all trading stocks in simulation.
Sharpe ratio record.
Number of config files passed.
Count of how many config files have been simulated.
Var with config file name.
Configuration object.
Data access object.
All the trading stocks in the simulation.
Main simulator constructor.

detaileddescription.para: Simulator.cpp Implementation of Simulator.h.

Created by Salil Maharjan on 4/29/20. Copyright 2020 Salil Maharjan. All rights reserved. Simulator::Simulator Parameterized constructor for Simulator class. Initializes the Simulator. Can handle multiple configuration files.
argc
int Number of command line arguments.
argv
const char* Array of command line arguments.

5/12/20.

briefdescription.para: Private default constructor.
Initializes the simulator by loading configurations, ticker data and trading stocks.

Simulator::initializeSimulator Main method to initialize simulator for run.
a_configFile
char* Config file to initialize simulator for.

5/12/20.

Simulator::rerunSimulator Rerun simulator for consecutive configuration files

char* Config file to initialize simulator for.

Simulator::initializePublications Initializes file write streams for the publications requested in configurations.

briefdescription.para: Checks if all required parameters are passed for simulator to run.

detaileddescription.para:
Simulator::checkParameters Checks if all required parameters are passed for simulator to run.
bool If all required parameters are in configuration file.
Salil Maharjan

briefdescription.para: Loads parameters required for the simulator.

detaileddescription.para:
Simulator::loadParameters Loads parameters from configuration file that are required for the simulation.
Salil Maharjan
5/12/20.

briefdescription.para: Initialize stocks that the simulator will be trading.

detaileddescription.para:
Simulator::initializeTradingTickers Initialize stock tickers from constituents file that the simulator will be trading.
Salil Maharjan
5/12/20.

briefdescription.para: Verify date range.

detaileddescription.para:
Simulator::verifyDateParameters Verify date range in configuration file to assert if data is available for that range. If not, the simulation will run for all available data instead of stopping.
Salil Maharjan
5/12/20.

briefdescription.para: Calculate trade signal.

detaileddescription.para:
Simulator::calculateSignal Function to calculate trade signal. Currently uses MACD indicator to get signal. If not, the simulation will run for all available data instead of stopping.
a_stockData
TickerData& The data of the trading stock in the specified date range.
double Trading signal.
Salil Maharjan
5/12/20.

briefdescription.para: Function to open or close positions according to the signal by checking current position.

detaileddescription.para:
Simulator::makeTrade Function to make trade according to the signal.
a_stock
TradingStock& The stock that is being traded.
a_currentPrice
double& Current price of the stock.
a_signalToday
double& Signal calculated for the day.
Salil Maharjan
5/12/20.

briefdescription.para: Check if available capital for a stock is enough to purchase more equities at a_price.

detaileddescription.para:
Simulator::hasEnoughCapital Check if available capital for a stock is enough to purchase more equities at a_price
a_stock
TradingStock& The stock that is being traded.
a_currentPrice
double& Current price of the stock.
bool If there is sufficient capital to buy positions of a_stock at a_price.

5/12/20.
